remarks: Image of a limit under a continuous map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2014.)
statement:
rlimcn1.1 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> X ) $.
rlimcn1.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
rlimcn1.3 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~>r C ) $.
rlimcn1.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
rlimcn1.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. X ( ( abs ` ( z - C ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` C ) ) ) < x ) ) $.
rlimcn1 $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) ~~>r ( F ` C ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d X z $.
$d ph x y $.
